concept.title: Bidirectional overview
concept.shortdesc: Publish this topic to check the publishing behavior for inline and block elements containing left-to-right languages.

conbody.p: This is an example text that, within the context of this English topic, include nevertheless some fragments in left-to-right language.
This can happen in a block element or in an inline element.
The processor SHOULD provide the proper direction for the text when publishing.
